```{r setup, include=FALSE}
cv_entries <- read_csv("resume/_content/cv_entries.csv") %>%
  dplyr::mutate(year_begin = year(mdy(date))) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(year_end = dplyr::case_when(
    date_end == "present" ~ date_end,
    !is.na(date_end) ~ str_sub(year(mdy(date_end)), 1, 4),
    is.na(date_end) ~ date_end)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(year = ifelse((is.na(year_end) | year_begin == year_end),
                      year_begin,
                      str_c(year_begin, " --- ", year_end)))


blank_year_when_repeated <- function(cv_entry_tibble){
  cv_entry_tibble %>% 
    mutate(row_number = row_number()) %>% 
    mutate(year_begin = as.character(year_begin),
           year_begin = case_when(
             row_number == 1 ~ year_begin,
             year_begin == lag(year_begin) ~ str_c('<span class="repeated-year">', year_begin, '</span>'),
             year_begin != lag(year_begin) ~ year_begin
           )) %>% 
    dplyr::mutate(year = ifelse(!is.na(lag(year)) & lag(year) == year, 
                          str_c('<span class="repeated-year">', year, '</span>'),
                          year))
}
```

# Current Position
```{r}
cv_entries %>% 
  dplyr::filter(type == 'current_positions', is.na(exclude)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(what = str_c("<span class='cv-entry-title'>", what, "</span><br>", where)) %>% 
  dplyr::select(year, what) %>% 
  kableExtra::kbl(padding = 0, col.names = NULL, escape = FALSE) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling( bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed"))  %>% 
  kableExtra::column_spec(1, width = "15%")

```

<br>

# Education
```{r}
cv_entries %>% 
  dplyr::filter(type == 'education') %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(what = str_c( "<span class='cv-entry-title'>", 
                              what, "</span>, ", where,
                              "<br>", 
                       ifelse(is.na(additional_info), "", additional_info) 
                       , "<br>", 
                       ifelse(is.na(additional_info2), "", additional_info2))) %>% 
  dplyr::select(year, what) %>% 
  kbl(padding = 0, col.names = NULL, escape = FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling( bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed"))   %>% 
  column_spec(1, width = "15%")

```

# Work Experience
```{r}
cv_entries %>% 
  dplyr::filter(type == 'work', is.na(website)) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(additional_info = replace_na(additional_info, "")) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(what = str_c("<span class='cv-entry-title'>", what, "</span><br class='work-break'>", where, "<br>", additional_info)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(date)) %>% 
  dplyr::select(year, what) %>% 
  kbl(padding = 0, col.names = NULL, escape = FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling( bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed"))   %>% 
  column_spec(1, width = "15%")
```

# Skills
```{r}
cv_entries %>% 
  dplyr::filter(type == 'technical') %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(icon = case_when(
    str_detect(what, "Programming") ~ "fa-laptop",
    str_detect(what, "Speaking") ~ "fa-flask",
    str_detect(what, "Soft") ~ "fa-earth"
  )) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(what = str_c("<i class='fa fa-lg ", icon, "'></i> &nbsp;<span class='cv-entry-title'>", what, "</span> ", additional_info)) %>% 
  dplyr::select(type, what) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(type = "") %>% 
  kbl(padding = 0, col.names = NULL, escape=FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling( bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed")) 
```
